purpose: The email is a call for abstracts and papers for the 2025 OkIP International Conference on Software Engineering Research & Development (SERD), scheduled for October 1-2, 2025, in Oklahoma City, OK, USA, and online. The submission deadline for abstracts or papers is July 15, 2025, and extended versions of the best papers will be considered for publication in the inaugural volume of the International Journal of Software Research. The email outlines various areas of interest for submissions, important dates, and types of contributions accepted for the conference.

infos:
Subject: Due July 15- SERD 2025 Software Engineering Research & Development, Oct 1-2, USA & Online
From: SEWORLD Moderator <[log in to unmask]>
Reply-To:[log in to unmask]
Date:Mon, 19 May 2025 15:46:33 -0000
Content-Type:text/plain
2025 OkIP International Conference on Software Engineering Research &
* General and Social Aspects of Software Engineering (SE)
- Camera Ready Paper Submission, Registration: August 7-22, 2025
